ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.9'

about.description:
The Virtual Brain Project (TVB Project) has the purpose of offering some |
modern tools to the Neurosciences community, for computing, simulating |
and analyzing functional and structural data of human brains. |
The Virtual Brain Storage module wraps a data persistence layer (File Storage HDF5)
about.summary: A package for performing whole brain simulations

about.description:
The Virtual Brain Project (TVB Project) has the purpose of offering some |
modern tools to the Neurosciences community, for computing, simulating |
and analyzing functional and structural data of human brains. |
The Virtual Brain Storage module wraps a data persistence layer (File Storage HDF5)
about.summary: A package for performing whole brain simulations

name: tvb-storage
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "tvb-storage" %}
{% set version = "2.10.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name | replace('-', '_') }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: d0651befa7c1185a4a579316f054040eeddea6bb9614f9c4a8c91fcdf017e5e4

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - hatchling

  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - h5py
    - numpy
    - pyaescrypt
    - tvb-library
    - python-kubernetes
    - requests

test:
  requires:
    - pytest
    - pip
    - decorator
    - python {{ python_min }}

  commands:
    - pip check
    - pytest --pyargs tvb.tests.storage

  imports:
    - tvb.storage

about:
  home: http://www.thevirtualbrain.com/
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: A package for performing whole brain simulations
  description: |
    The Virtual Brain Project (TVB Project) has the purpose of offering some |
    modern tools to the Neurosciences community, for computing, simulating |
    and analyzing functional and structural data of human brains. |
    The Virtual Brain Storage module wraps a data persistence layer (File Storage HDF5)
  doc_url: http://docs.thevirtualbrain.org/
  dev_url: https://github.com/the-virtual-brain/tvb-root

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - liadomide
    - popaula937
